duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and design user-friendly websites, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing experience for end users.
Conduct user research and incorporate feedback to enhance the user experience and functionality of websites.
Utilize graphic design software and tools to produce high-quality visuals, illustrations, and multimedia content for web applications.
Implement responsive design principles to ensure websites function effectively across various devices and screen sizes.
Collaborate with developers to translate design concepts into fully functional websites and web elements.
Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in web design, incorporating innovative ideas into design projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Web Design, Graphic Design, Computer Science, or related field (Certification in UX Design is a plus)
